DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / QUARTERFINALS ; FACTS AND FIGURES
DOC.TEXT: At Stanford Stadium Palo Alto Sweden : 2 * Romania : 2 * Sweden wins on penalty kicks , 5-4 SCORING SUMMARY Romania : 1 1 1 -- 2 Sweden : 1 1 -- 2 First_half scoring -- None . Second_half scoring -- 1 . Sweden , Brolin 2 , 79th minute ; 2 . Romania , Raducioiu 3 , 89th minute . First overtime -- 3 . Romania , Raducioiu 4 , 101st . Second overtime -- 4 . Sweden , K . Andersson 4 , 115th . Penalty kicks -- Romania : 4 ( Raducioiu goal , Hagi G , Lupescu G , Petrescu no goal , Dumitrescu G , Belodedici NG ) . Sweden : 5 ( Mild NG , K . Andersson G , Brolin G , Ingesson G , R . Nilsson G , Larsson G ) . Shots on goal -- Romania : 21 ( Hagi 8 , Raducioiu 4 , Panduru 2 , Lupescu 2 , Dumitrescu 2 , Munteanu 2 , Petrescu ) . Andersson , Mild ) . Yellow Cards -- Romania : Popescu 22nd minute , Selimess 35th minute . Sweden : Schwarz 43rd . minute . Red Cards -- Sweden , Schwarz 102nd minute . Referee -- Philip Don , England . Linesmen -- Park Hae Yong , South_Korea ; Roy Pearson , England . Attendance -- 81 # 715 . LINEUPS Romania -- Florin Prunea ; Dan Petrescu , Daniel Prodan , Miodrag Belodedici , Gheorghe Popescu ; Tibor Selimess , Dorinel Munteanu ( Basarab Panduru , substitute , 84th minute ) , Gheorghe Hagi , Ilie Dumitrescu ; Ionut Lupescu , Florin Raducioiu . Sweden -- Thomas Ravelli ; Roland Nilsson , Patrik Andersson , Joachim Bjorklund ( Pontus Kamark , 84th minute ) , Roger Ljung ; Stefan Schwarz , Klas Ingesson , Martin Dahlin ( Henrik Larsson , 108th minute ) , Tomas Brolin ; Hakan Mild , Kennet Andersson .
